languages.text: "Действуем по плану Соломона: заманиваем врагов в засаду и уничтожаем одной атакой".
"We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."
languages.original_text: "Действуем по плану Соломона: заманиваем врагов в засаду и уничтожаем одной атакой".

traits.locale_text: "We're following Solomorne's plan: disinformation and a massive strike against both sides."
"We're following Solomorne's plan: disinformation and a massive strike against both sides."
"We're following Solomorne's plan: disinformation, as well as a massive strike against both sides."
"We're following Solomorne's plan: disinformation, as well as a massive strike against both sides."
"We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."
"We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."

languages.text: 「ソロモーンの言うとおり、敵を待ち伏せに誘い込み、一気に殲滅するのだ」
languages.original_text: "We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンの言うとおり、敵を待ち伏せに誘い込み、一気に殲滅するのだ」

languages.text: «Vamos a seguir el plan de Solomorne: atraer al enemigo a una emboscada y acabar con todos a la vez».
languages.original_text: "We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos a seguir el plan de Solomorne: atraer al enemigo a una emboscada y acabar con todos a la vez».

languages.text: « Nous suivons le plan de Solomorne : nous allons attirer l'adversaire dans une embuscade et le détruire d'un seul coup. »
languages.original_text: "We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."

traits.locale_text: « Nous suivons le plan de Solomorne : nous allons attirer l'adversaire dans une embuscade et le détruire d'un seul coup. »

languages.text: “就按索罗蒙的计划来吧，把敌人引到埋伏圈里，一网打尽。”
languages.original_text: "We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."

traits.locale_text: “就按索罗蒙的计划来吧，把敌人引到埋伏圈里，一网打尽。”

languages.text: "Wir folgen Solomornes Plan: Wir locken unsere Feinde in einen Hinterhalt und vernichten sie dann alle auf einen Streich."
languages.original_text: "We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."

traits.locale_text: "Wir folgen Solomornes Plan: Wir locken unsere Feinde in einen Hinterhalt und vernichten sie dann alle auf einen Streich."

languages.text: "Solomorne'un planını uyguluyoruz: Düşmanı pusuya çekip tek bir darbeyle hepsini ortadan kaldıracağız."
languages.original_text: "We're following Solomorne's plan: lure the enemy into an ambush, then destroy them all in one fell swoop."
